Class Clerk_Home_Page

java.lang.Object
Clerk_Home_Page
public class Clerk_Home_Page extends Object
This class consists of the components that make up the clerks point of view in the point-of-sale system.

    Field

    Description
    Clerk_Home_Page(Vector<Order> orders, ArrayList<Tuple> inventory, ArrayList<String> entrees, ArrayList<String> protein, ArrayList<String> sides, boolean additional_entree)
    This constructor creates the layout for the clerk home page with buttons to take the customer's order

      JFrame f

  • Constructor Details

    • Clerk_Home_Page

      Clerk_Home_Page(Vector<Order> orders, ArrayList<Tuple> inventory, ArrayList<String> entrees, ArrayList<String> protein, ArrayList<String> sides, boolean additional_entree)
      This constructor creates the layout for the clerk home page with buttons to take the customer's order
      Parameters:
      orders - the vector of orders taken from the Clerk-side view
      inventory - a vector of tuples that stores the items in the inventory
      entrees - a vector of strings that contains the 3 different entree types (bowl, burrito, tacos)
      protein - a vector of strings that contains the 4 different protein options
      sides - a vector of strings that contains the side items
      additional_entree - a boolean variable where 1 represents the customer is ordering another entree and 0 means no more entrees

  • Method Details

    • windowClosing

      public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e)
      This method is used to close the instance of the GUI window so that the user doesn't have to close it manually through the terminal.
      Parameters:
      e - a WindowEvent object that indicates the status of the java.swing window
